steps.content:
/>

Click to Create a New Contact

A contact can be a new lead, a former customer, a current customer, or even from a physical store you'd like to connect with.

You can also categorize each contact using the Smart List and Custom Contact List features later on.

/>

Click to Search, Filter and Sort

Type a name, phone number, or email to search for specific contacts.

You can also use filters to narrow down results based on your conditions, and easily sort the contact list below to suit your preferences.

/>

Click to View Contact Details

Simply click on any contact name to view detailed information.

Here, you can easily view and edit contact info, manage related tasks and notes, and communicate directlyâ€”all in one place.

/>

Click to Change Results per Page

Adjust the number of contacts displayed in this window by changing the results per page setting

finishModalContent.title: Congrats
finishModalContent.description: You have finish our tutorial for Contact page. thank you for using our CRM, we love to receive feedback from our customers feel free to submit it. thank you again for your time
